description: Aela tests whether you can hunt with patience and kill with purpose. The wild doesn't reward noise; it rewards teeth and timing.

objectives.description: Speak to Aela in Jorrvaskr after Proving Honor is active

notes: Unlocked by winning Athis spar with a tactical/athletic style.
